search_results.title: About Robert B. Sloan
search_results.snippet: Sloan is known as a visionary leader who is able to help universities think about what they want to become, and help them move toward those goals.

search_results.title: Robert B. Sloan | Author, Communicator, Educator, and Leader
search_results.snippet: Dr. Robert B. Sloan is president of Houston Christian University in Houston, Texas. Dr. Sloan and his wife Sue have seven adult children and 24 grandchildren.

search_results.title: Dr Stephen Sloan: Author Home
search_results.snippet: Dr. Sloan is a pioneer in research and teaching on terrorism since the 1970s. His course was one of the first to be given at a university.
